content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 pound chicken parts" )
( ing-1 "1 large onion" )
( ing-2 "3 stalks celery, including some leaves" )
( ing-3 "1 large carrot" )
( ing-4 "1 1/2 teaspoons salt" )
( ing-5 "3 whole cloves" )
( ing-6 "6 cups water" )
( ing-7 "1/4 cup cold water (optional)" )
( ing-8 "1 egg" )

content.text: 1) Chop scrubbed celery and carrot into 1 inch chunks.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Chop"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "scrubbed celery"@8:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "carrot"@28:34 / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "1 inch chunks"@40:53 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place chicken pieces, onion, celery, carrot, salt, and cloves in large soup pot or Dutch oven.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chicken pieces"@9:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "onion"@25:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "celery"@32:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "carrot"@40:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@48:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cloves"@58:64 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "large soup pot"@68:82 / TOOL )
		:gol ( tool-2-1 "Dutch oven"@86:96 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 1 hour.
9) Separate the egg white from the egg yolk, and reserve the shell.
10) In a small bowl, combine 1/4 cup cold water, egg white, and crushed eggshell.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "1/4 cup cold water"@29:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "egg white"@49:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "crushed eggshell"@64:80 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-10-0 "a small bowl"@7:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Add to strained stock, and bring to a boil.
12) Remove from heat, and let stand 5 minutes.
13) Strain again through a sieve lined with cheesecloth.
